text: @Yamiche @jonathanvswan Coronavirus "maybe flattening some curves", but past its peak? Let's hear from the doctors, scientist and researchers on that issue. A White House source maybe the guy who suggested injecting disinfectants and penetrating UV lights in some body hole or somewhere.
